function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 due to disruptions in supply chains and logistics operations","Impact":"Increased infection rates, safety concerns, and potential economic crisis","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, vaccination programs, and remote working policies","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote monitoring technologies, and supply chain management systems","People":"Workers, logistics personnel, and the general population","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and companies"},{"Description":"Lack of research on the impact of contagious diseases on environmental factors","Impact":"Limited understanding of the link between pollution and health-related risks/issues","Mitigation":"Conducting research on pollutant emissions, resource management, and their impact on population health","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring technologies, pollution control systems, and health impact assessments","People":"Environmental researchers, public health officials, and policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions and government agencies"},{"Description":"Limited focus on social dimensions and individual-related issues related to contagious diseases","Impact":"Insufficient consideration of social equity, accessibility, affordability, and individual well-being","Mitigation":"Conducting research on social equity, accessibility, affordability, and well-being, and incorporating these factors into policy and decision-making","Technologies":"Social impact assessment tools, data analytics for social indicators, and decision support systems","People":"Social scientists, public health researchers, and policy makers","Owner":"Social research institutions and government bodies"}]}
